summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of My Predictions page enhancements. Summary card filters (Total/Correct/Wrong/Pending) are fully functional as clickable buttons with proper active state styling and instant filtering. Forward navigation (My Predictions → Home) is fast with no loading spinner. Missing reverse navigation link in main navigation menu.

navigation_issues.issue: My Predictions link missing from main navigation on Home page
navigation_issues.description: Users can navigate from My Predictions to Home page, but cannot easily navigate back from Home to My Predictions without using direct URL or browser back button

session_issues.description: User authentication session appears to expire after short periods, requiring frequent re-login during testing

passed_tests: Summary cards (Total, Correct, Wrong, Pending) are clickable buttons
Active summary card shows green ring/border highlight (border-primary ring-2 ring-primary/30)
Clicking different summary cards properly transfers active state
Summary card filtering works instantly without API calls or loading spinners
Pending filter shows 4 pending predictions correctly
Correct filter shows 0 predictions (empty state) correctly
Wrong filter shows 0 predictions (empty state) correctly
Total filter shows all 4 predictions correctly
Forward navigation (My Predictions → Home) is instant with no loading spinner
Summary cards work alongside status filters (All/Live/Upcoming/Finished)
Fade animation plays when switching filters (animate-fade-in class applied)
Grid/List view toggle visible on desktop (1920px width)
My Predictions page loads correctly with proper test data
action_item_for_main_agent: Add 'My Predictions' link to main navigation menu on Home page so users can easily navigate back from Home → My Predictions. Consider adding to user dropdown menu or main navigation bar alongside Home, Matches, Leaderboard links.

success_percentage.frontend: 85% - All core features working, missing navigation link only
